Title: Pediatric herpes simplex virus encephalitis complicated by N-Methyl-D-Aspartate receptor antibody encephalitis
Abstract: ©The Author 2014.N-methyl-D-aspartate receptor antibodies (NMDAR-Abs) can contribute to neurological relapse after herpes simplex virus encephalitis (HSE). We describe a child with NMDAR-Ab encephalitis after HSE, which was recognized and treated early. We discuss the case in the context of existing reports, and we propose a modified immunotherapy strategy to minimize risk of viral reactivation.
